survey_name: Gen Z Financial Literacy and Banking Preferences Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the financial habits, literacy levels, and banking preferences of Generation Z (ages 18-25) to help financial institutions tailor their products and services.

questions.question_text: Which of the following best describes your primary banking method?
answer_options: Mobile payment apps (e.g., Venmo, Cash App)
I do not currently use banking services
questions.client_notes: Use radio buttons for single selection. Ensure options cover all common banking methods among Gen Z.

script.question_text: Which of the following best describes your primary banking method?
answer_options: Mobile payment apps (e.g., Venmo, Cash App)
I do not currently use banking services

questions.question_text: How confident are you in managing your personal finances?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Consider adding a tooltip with examples of personal finance management.

script.question_text: How confident are you in managing your personal finances?

questions.question_text: Which of the following financial topics would you like to learn more about? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections with checkboxes. Include an 'Other' option if needed.

script.question_text: Which of the following financial topics would you like to learn more about? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What features do you value most in a banking app?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents who selected any banking method in Q1 except 'I do not currently use banking services'
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Consider randomizing the order of options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: What features do you value most in a banking app?
script.routing_logic: All respondents who selected any banking method in Q1 except 'I do not currently use banking services'

questions.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from investing?
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an open-ended 'Other' option to capture unique responses.

script.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from investing?

questions.question_text: How did you primarily learn about personal finance?
questions.client_notes: Use radio buttons for single selection. Randomize options to minimize order bias.

script.question_text: How did you primarily learn about personal finance?

questions.question_text: What would encourage you to use a traditional bank over mobile payment apps or online-only banks?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Mobile payment apps' or 'Online-only bank' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights. Provide a text box with a 200-character limit.

script.question_text: What would encourage you to use a traditional bank over mobile payment apps or online-only banks?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Mobile payment apps' or 'Online-only bank' in Q1
